OpenNewTab.Name: open new tab
OpenNewTab.Help: This command opens a new tab

SearchTab.Name: search tab
SearchTab.Help: This command searches content in a tab

MoveCursorRight.Name: move cursor right
MoveCursorRight.Help: This command moves the current tab to the one on the right

MoveCursorLeft.Name: move cursor left
MoveCursorLeft.Help: This command moves the current tab to the one on the left
